welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nakatsu, Japan! Known for its beautiful mountain views and traditional charm, we invite you to explore the city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful and memorable stay here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kita Kyushu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ube Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ube Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free after completing a short registration process.
